title: LinkSphere
description: Link aggregator website with user authentication, inspired by Linktree. Created with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

title: Zephyr
description: Weather website built around the Open-Meteo API. Created with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

title: To-Do List
description: Simple to-do list website with user authentication, built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
